Seed number 14 corresponds soil number 14. Seed number 55 corresponds soil number 57. Seed number 13 corresponds soil number 13. gardener team want get started soon possible, \'d like know closest location needs seed. Using maps, find lowest location number corresponds initial seeds. , \'ll need convert seed number categories can find corresponding location number. example, corresponding types : Seed 79, soil 81, fertilizer 81, water 81, light 74, temperature 78, humidity 78, location 82. Seed 14, soil 14, fertilizer 53, water 49, light 42, temperature 42, humidity 43, location 43. Seed 55, soil 57, fertilizer 57, water 53, light 46, temperature 82, humidity 82, location 86. Open public! Grand prize -expenses-paid trip Desert Island!\" must sand comes ! Best , boat races starting just minutes. manage sign competitor boat races just time. organizer explains \'s really traditional race - instead, get fixed amount time boat travel far can, win boat goes farthest. part signing , get sheet paper (puzzle input) lists time allowed race also best distance ever recorded race. guarantee win grand prize, need make sure go farther race current record holder. organizer brings area boat races held. boats much smaller expected - \'re actually toy boats, big button top. Holding button charges boat, releasing button allows boat move. Boats move faster button held longer, time spent holding button counts total race time. can hold button start race, boats don\'t move button released. example:   document describes three races: first race lasts 7 milliseconds. record distance race 9 millimeters. second race lasts 15 milliseconds. record distance race 40 millimeters. third race lasts 30 milliseconds. record distance race 200 millimeters. toy boat starting speed zero millimeters per millisecond. whole millisecond spend beginning race holding button, boat\'s speed increases one millimeter per millisecond. , first race lasts 7 milliseconds, options: Don\'t hold button (, hold 0 milliseconds) start race. boat won\'t move; traveled 0 millimeters end race. Hold button 1 millisecond start race. , boat travel speed 1 millimeter per millisecond 6 milliseconds, reaching total distance traveled 6 millimeters. Hold button 2 milliseconds, giving boat speed 2 millimeters per millisecond. get 5 milliseconds move, reaching total distance 10 millimeters. Hold button 3 milliseconds. remaining 4 milliseconds travel time, boat gone 12 millimeters. Hold button 4 milliseconds. remaining 3 milliseconds travel time, boat gone 12 millimeters. Hold button 5 milliseconds, causing boat travel total 10 millimeters. Hold button 6 milliseconds, causing boat travel total 6 millimeters. Hold button 7 milliseconds. \'s entire duration race. never let go button. boat can\'t move let go button. Please make sure let go button boat gets move. 0 millimeters. Since current record race 9 millimeters, actually 4 different ways win: hold button 2, 3, 4, 5 milliseconds start race. second race, hold button least 4 milliseconds 11 milliseconds beat record, total 8 different ways win. third race, hold button least 11 milliseconds 19 milliseconds still beat record, total 9 ways win. see much margin error , determine number ways can beat record race; example, multiply values together, get 288 (4 \* 8 \* 9). Come ; show .\" beckons onto camel. riding bit across sands Desert Island, can see look like large rocks covering half horizon. Elf explains rocks along part Desert Island directly Island Island, making hard even get . Normally, use big machines move rocks filter sand, machines broken Desert Island recently stopped receiving parts need fix machines. \'ve already assumed \'ll job figure parts stopped asks can help. agree automatically. journey take days, offers teach game Camel Cards. Camel Cards sort similar pokertarget="_blank" except \'s designed easier play riding camel. Camel Cards, get list hands, goal order based strength hand. hand consists five cards labeled one , K, Q, J, T, 9, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2. relative strength card follows order, highest 2 lowest. Every hand exactly one type. strongest weakest, : Five kind, five cards label: AAAAA Four kind, four cards label one card different label: AA8AA Full house, three cards label, remaining two cards share different label: 23332 Three kind, three cards label, remaining two cards different card hand: TTT98 Two pair, two cards share one label, two cards share second label, remaining card third label: 23432 One pair, two cards share one label, three cards different label pair : A23A4 High card, cards\' labels distinct: 23456 Hands primarily ordered based type; example, every full house stronger three kind. two hands type, second ordering rule takes effect. Start comparing first card hand. cards different, hand stronger first card considered stronger. first card hand label, however, move considering second card hand. differ, hand higher second card wins; otherwise, continue third card hand, fourth, fifth. , 33332 2AAAA four kind hands, 33332 stronger first card stronger. Similarly, 77888 77788 full house, 77888 stronger third card stronger (hands first second card). play Camel Cards, given list hands corresponding bid (puzzle input). example:   example shows five hands; hand followed bid amount. hand wins amount equal bid multiplied rank, weakest hand gets rank 1, second-weakest hand gets rank 2, strongest hand. five hands example, strongest hand rank 5 bid multiplied 5. , first step put hands order strength: 32T3K one pair hands stronger type, gets rank 1. KK677 KTJJT two pair. first cards label, second card KK677 stronger (K vs T), KTJJT gets rank 2 KK677 gets rank 3. T55J5 QQQJA three kind. QQQJA stronger first card, gets rank 5 T55J5 gets rank 4. Now, can determine total winnings set hands adding result multiplying hand\'s bid rank (765 \* 1 + 220 \* 2 + 28 \* 3 + 684 \* 4 + 483 \* 5). total winnings example 6440. Find rank every hand set. total winnings? Part Two (Use manually add .) (Try using convert_clipboard_html_to_roxygen_md())
